conbody.p: Identifying XPath is an effective way to find nested elements that cannot be identified by common properties such as ID, name, or class. Katalon Studio can generate and optimize XPath for HTML elements, regardless of how deeply nested they are. You can use these XPaths to identify elements without searching through the DOM tree.
The example below illustrates how Katalon Studio generates and optimizes XPath automatically when you spy on the Make Appointment object (a nested element).

image.alt: detecting elements with XPath by Katalon Studio
